meanings.definition: A person who operates an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The pilots flew the plane smoothly through the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The pilots trained for years to become skilled aviators.
meanings.sent3: The pilots joked about having wings of their own.
meanings.sent4: The pilots navigated the skies like masters of the wind.
meanings.sent5: The pilots' job is to ensure safe travels for all passengers.

meanings.definition: To guide or steer in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: She pilots the boat along the river with great skill.
meanings.sent2: He pilots the spaceship through the galaxy, exploring new worlds.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to pilot the toy car around the room.
meanings.sent4: The leader pilots the team towards success with determination.
meanings.sent5: The captain pilots the ship through the stormy seas, keeping everyone safe.

meanings.definition: A television program produced as a prototype for a series.
meanings.sent1: The studio created multiple pilots to test audience reactions.
meanings.sent2: The pilot episode of the show introduced the main characters.
meanings.sent3: The pilot for the new series had everyone laughing at the funny scenes.
meanings.sent4: The pilot of the TV show set the tone for the entire season.
meanings.sent5: The network executives watched the pilot closely to decide on its future.
